function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mandatory usage of face masks and physical distancing without mobility restrictions","Impact":"May not effectively reduce contagion distance and rate","Mitigation":"Implement additional measures to reduce contagion distance and rate","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Use of face masks and 50% social isolation","Impact":"May not sufficiently reduce infection peak and number of deaths","Mitigation":"Implement stricter social isolation measures and public health education","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote work technologies","People":"General population","Owner":"Local authorities, community leaders"}]}
